statements: SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, timestamp, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT id, timestamp, solar_radiation FROM WeatherData WHERE solar_radiation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, wind_speed, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE wind_speed > 10 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature, humidity, wind_speed, solar_radiation FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT timestamp, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 50 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC
SELECT id, solar_radiation FROM WeatherData WHERE solar_radiation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT city, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed < 5
SELECT city, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE city IN ('London', 'Paris')
SELECT city, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT city, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity <= 70 AND wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT city, date, solar_energy, wind_energy FROM energy_production WHERE date='2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city='New York' AND humidity > 50 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT city, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE city='London' AND temperature < 20 ORDER BY wind_speed ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, solar_energy, wind_energy FROM energy_production WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY solar_energy DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, solar_prediction, wind_prediction FROM predictions WHERE wind_prediction > solar_prediction ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE solar_energy > wind_energy;
SELECT date, solar_prediction, wind_prediction FROM predictions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY solar_prediction DESC, wind_prediction ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM weather_data GROUP BY date HAVING avg_temp > 20;

SELECT date, SUM(solar_energy) AS total_solar_energy, SUM(wind_energy) AS total_wind_energy FROM energy_production GROUP BY date HAVING total_solar_energy > 100 AND total_wind_energy < 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT date, irradiance FROM solar_irradiance WHERE date = '2021-08-15';
SELECT date, solar_energy, wind_energy FROM energy_production WHERE solar_energy > 100 AND wind_energy < 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM solar_irradiance WHERE DATE(date) = '2022-05-20';
SELECT date, speed FROM wind_speed WHERE speed >= 15 ORDER BY speed ASC;
SELECT date, solar_energy, wind_energy FROM energy_production WHERE solar_energy > 100 OR wind_energy > 50;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, irradiance FROM solar_irradiance ORDER BY formatted_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM energy_production ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_forecast WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, date, location, solar_energy, wind_energy FROM energy_prediction WHERE predicted_solar_energy > 100 ORDER BY date LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY location HAVING avg_temp > 20 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC;
SELECT date, location, wind_speed FROM weather_forecast WHERE forecasted_temperature < 30 AND forecasted_wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY date, location;
SELECT location, SUM(solar_energy) AS total_solar_energy FROM energy_production GROUP BY location HAVING total_solar_energy > 100 ORDER BY total_solar_energy DESC;
SELECT date, location, predicted_wind_energy FROM energy_prediction WHERE predicted_solar_energy BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY location, date DESC;
